Install pivpn on Linux Ubuntu Server PIVPN, the easiest way to set up WireGuard on the cloud Ubuntu Server.
WireGuard doesn’t need any additional recommendations.
The installation is very simple.
curl -L https://install.pivpn.io | bash I reccommand to see instalation process on “Raspberry Pi Tutorial” (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kLmbgJe1rEU)

WireGuard on Raspbian as Dead Switch Modify rc.local in /etc.
Enter those lines after fi.
piuk is a name of the WireGuard network interface.
sleep 15 sudo iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o piuk -j MASQUERADE sudo iptables -A FORWARD -i piuk -o eth0 -m state --state RELATEDESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT sudo iptables -A FORWARD -i eth0 -o piuk -j ACCEPT exit 0
